course_title: Special Topics in Historical Theology: Nature of Discipleship
class_notes: (Alonzo L. McDonald Family Chair on the Life and Teachings of Jesus and Their Impact on Culture  Course) (ON CAMPUS)  (Christian discipleship has always claimed to 'follow' or 'imitate' Jesus. But the precise meaning of discipleship has changed over the centuries. By examining classic works of spirituality, this course seeks to discover both the elements of discontinuity and of continuity in this critical dimension of theology.)
